about.title: About Us
about.P1: Over the past 49 years, Dar Al Riyadh has evolved into a fully integrated, value-added services company with a workforce of over 1,000 staff covering the length and breadth of the country.
about.P2: Our centers of excellence serve all prime sectors of the Kingdom, from oil and gas to transportation, education, and healthcare, with an array of value-added services, including engineering, construction management, industrial systems, client support services, and geomatics.
